post.body: @headphonaught Who wants to be Spartacus anyway? I am Maximus Aurelius!
Good work - Keep it up. Not the weight but the effort.
In 96 I released my 1st experimental Jazz album with that name - followed by the acclaimed 2nd, Jelly Babies and Heroine
I was going to say give him a hug from us but a) he probably doesn't remember us and b) he'd rather a fiver - so pick
no specific reason. that's how many can fit plus one special one for mum
if people didn't know you were a photographer that statement comes across very violent. Eeeek!
@darrinreeves I have - coarse and smelly
yes pleasy
Santa is listening to us all I hope
@darrinreeves Working for a design firm near Mayfair, on freelance contract for now, could go further though.
nope - there's a bug going round.
Seriously my friend - stop reading all that religious stuff and go buy some more comics. Dark Knight's the tip of the iceberg
Just read the blog, glad you're doing well.
you will not be disappointed.
ow! sorry man - that's as painful for you as it is for him right?
I am! http://twitpic.com/up7z
happy birthday!!!!
Isaw her at the latter
@lindsaygillie hello lins!
sorry my friend, I can sympathize - Evie and Elijah both seem allergic to good nights sleep right now.
my 5 yr old nephew just took a dump in the bath - then carried it and his pooey self to the loo - there are some boundaries to my love. :{
wanna have your heart explode ... http://fc40.deviantart.com/fs38/f/2008/332/e/2/e203281a661bc2444adc89f9ee027985.jpg
Doomsday on Smallville looks like a Power Ranger Villain. Stupid.
love this http://www.vimeo.com/2251254
A collection of nearly 3,000 Star Wars-related images on Flickr! I just messed myself http://www.flickr.com/photos/heilemann/
I just noticed. Master Shifu in Kung Fu Panda is actually a panda too. He's a red panda. So there's 2 Kung Fu Pandas
If you like me feel like being a good dad is hard enough - this guy does this every morning for his kids http://lunchbagart.tumblr.com/
School & village getting stuck into to tree planting. http://twitpic.com/pf3m
In the fields behind the village school planting 1751 trees today with the whole community in memory of my mother-in-law
Top Gear once again has awesome music in it's edits. I love thee Top Gear.
yes-freakin-please http://tinyurl.com/5kogsa
They've made Jesus a Carrot! http://twitpic.com/q2og
Just saw: Rosa Parks sat, so that MLK could walk. MLK walked so that Barack Obama could run. Obama ran, so we could fly
I like using the scales at my mum and dad's, very encouraging, clearly broken. http://twitpic.com/qayy
My home-made (from scratch) Thai Green Curry, A bottle of Rouge, my wife, my father-in-law and the decorations are up. Tis a good evening
The people of London vary from far too happy for their own good or far too grumpy for my liking. Where's the happy medium?
Avoid The Day the Earth Stood Still at all costs. Other than hanging out with Ed that was a wasted evening.
Just seen my son play a star on his school christmas performance. It astounds me just how much 4 year olds can't stand still Did me proud.
Anyone know if the CameraBag app is worth buying?
Naughty trains making me late for work!!?
The runs and vomiting means no work for me today, this is no fun. Blurgh!?
http://tinyurl.com/67c9n6
Reading Duma Key on train, liking it so far.
Train home smells like Bacon
Watching Top Gear with the wife. Both she and Vietnam are beautiful.
Hitting the London museums with the kids today. Free and enjoyable.
Being a smedium is frustrating - small's too tight medium's too big. Curse my short, yet muscular frame.
FACT: Lego and Transformers are fun, however old you are.
Merry Christmas to all of you. Now stop tweeting and get eating.
Most glitchy app of 2008 award goes to the Facebook App.
Train is virtually empty this morning. Work. Client meeting. Then hopefully home for Christmas
Creepy talking ChristNaa Tree. Pure Evil http://twitpic.com/ux4p
Pastel orange fades to lilac then to blue whilst inside the tin vessel of glaring flourescent tubes I wish to still be asleep - morning.
Back at work, wishing the stomach cramps & rough feeling from this virus would end.
